name: Hima Marketing
overview:
On 1st November, 1991, a proprietary organization by name Hima & Company has been established by Mr. G. Chandra Sekhara Rao and in 1994 the company entity has been changed to a Private Limited Company and thus Hima Marketing Pvt. Ltd., has come into existence on 9th December, 1994. “Hima Marketing Pvt. Ltd.” offers Oil Purification Services, Honeywell Electrical & General Safety Solutions, Turbo Make Air Pr-Cleaners, SVS Wind Ventilators, Conveyor Care Products from Tip Top Germany, Specialty Lubricants from MOTUL Tech, Quenching Oil.

List Of Industries Where Our Products Are Used: Coal Mining Industry Power Plants Foundries Process Industry Pharmaceutical Industry General Engineering & Rig Industry Paper Industry Defence Industry

The Network: With a 30 member team, HMPL currently have Head Office at Hyderabad, with operations from 4 more places viz. Kothagudem, Ramagundam, Chennai, Bhuvaneshwar with sufficient staff and set up to co-ordinate the customers from respective territories.

Vendor Base: In order to offer our esteemed clients with quality products, we have built alliances with a vast and authentic vendor base. Our vendors are known to use quality ingredients and processing techniques while developing the range. We choose our vendors on the basis of their market position and credibility. Some other reasons that we keep in mind while selecting our vendors include their domain expertise, timely delivery, financial stability and packaging standards. Due to this highly renowned vendor base, we are able to cater to the diverse requirements of customers within the stipulated time frame.

Products & Services: Wind Ventilators Process Engineering Equipments Conveyor Care Products Oil Purifiers RO Water Purifiers UPS & Batteries Water Proofing Products Specialized Welding Electrodes Oil Purification Services Vacuum Pumps
